item.title: PinFuse: Diffusion-Aware Denoising for Spatial Transcriptomics [Ongoing]
item.description: PinFuse reduces diffusion-induced noise in spatial transcriptomics data, allowing users to recover higher-fidelity gene expression signals and achieve more accurate downstream analyses.

item.title: SemiSeg: A Novel Graph-based Cell Typing Algorithm for Subcellular High-resolution Spatial Transcriptomics Data [Ongoing]
item.description: Developed a new method that incorporates cell boundary constraints to guide neighbor-aware cell typing, resulting in more accurate single-cell gene expression profiles.

item.title: Attention-based Multiple Instance Learning of Head and Neck Cancer Grading on Digital Pathology Using Vision-language Foundation Models
item.description: Adapted Vision-Language Foundational Models (VLFM) to perform interpretable HNSCC tumor grading on H&E whole slide images (WSI) via attention-based multiple instance learning.

item.title: Is Self-Supervised Pre-training on Satellite Imagery Better than ImageNet? A Systematic Study with Sentinel-2
item.description: Systematically evaluated self-supervised pre-training on in-domain versus out-of-domain foundational datasets for downstream tasks in satellite imagery.
